pages.text: Relic weapons are unique heirlooms a Witcher has discovered in their years of adventuring. They are challenging to obtain, but each one provides a unique effect that the Witcher can wield.
Turn the page to learn more...

A blade awarded by the Lady of the Lake to a knight she deems virtous and good. While holding $(c)[Aerondight]$() in your mainhand, press $(6)$(l)[$(k:use)]$() to imbue 1 XP level into the weapon, empowering it with 30 charges (600 charges maximum). While empowered, $(c)[Aerondight]$() will deal bonus damage, summon lightning on enemies exposed to the sky, and make the wielder immune to lightning. Each hit will deplete 1 charge.

pages.title: Recipe (smithing)
pages.text: Combine a $(l:weapons_armour/silver_sword_entry#page_grandmaster_silver_sword)Grandmaster Silver Sword$() with the $(l:crafting/ladys_favour#page_ladys_favour)Lady's Favour$() in a smithing table.

The blade of Olgierd Von Everec, named after his betrothed. Unlocks $(l)Adrenaline$(). Each strike with $(c)[Iris]$() will generate 1 $(l)Adrenaline$() point (3 charges maximum, depletes over time). When your $(l)Adrenaline$() meter is full, strike an opponent to rend them, dealing high damage with a low chance to set their health to 1. Alternatively, press $(6)$(l)[$(k:use)]$() to whirl, dealing damage to enemies in your attack radius passively and destroying any arrows that enter the radius. Both abilities will set your $(l)Adrenaline$() to 0 when used.

pages.title: Recipe (smithing)
pages.text: Combine a $(l:weapons_armour/steel_sword_entry#page_grandmaster_steel_sword)Grandmaster Steel Sword$() with the $(l:crafting/violet_rose#page_violet_rose)Violet Rose$() in a smithing table.

A blade once belonging to King Erlend Stonefist, with deep ties to Skellige. Whilst holding $(c)[Winter's Blade]$() in your mainhand, you are granted the $(l:potions/blizzard#page_blizzard)Blizzard$() effect. Press $(6)$(l)[$(k:use)]$() while holding $(c)[Winter's Blade]$() in your mainhand to summon the White Frost, turning water sources into ice, and weak ground blocks into powdered snow.

pages.title: Recipe (smithing)
pages.text: Combine a $(l:weapons_armour/steel_sword_entry#page_grandmaster_steel_sword)Grandmaster Steel Sword$() with the $(l:crafting/tedd_sample#page_tedd_sample)Tedd Deireadh Sample$() in a smithing table.
